2.0.0.en:
Updated discord.js to v14
ğŸ’¥ Breaking: Activity types and channel types are now in title case. Example: `PLAYING` is now `Playing`, `GUILD_TEXT` is now `GuildText`.
ğŸ’¥ Breaking: In raw states all `type` field values are now numbers representing the internal enum values of the types.
Add support for messages from the notification-manager adapter
Updated dependencies
Added Ukrainian translations
Updated translations

1.1.6.de: Die Anzahl und Liste der Mitglieder in SprachkanÃ¤len werden nun korrekt aktualisiert

text.en: Activity types and channel types are now in title case. Example: PLAYING is now Playing, GUILD_TEXT is now GuildText. In raw states all type field values are now numbers representing the internal enum values of the types. Please make sure to check and update your usages of the types after upgrading to version 2.0.0 or newer.
text.de: AktivitÃ¤tstypen und Kanaltypen sind nun in TitleCase. Beispiel: PLAYING ist jetzt Playing, GUILD_TEXT ist jetzt GuildText. In RohzustÃ¤nden sind nun alle type-Werte Zahlen, die den internen Enum-Werten der Typen entsprechen. Bitte darauf achten, die Verwenung von Typ-Werten nach dem Upgrade auf Version 2.0.0 oder neuer zu Ã¼berprÃ¼fen und ggf. zu aktualisieren.

Em estados crus, todos os valores de campo do tipo sÃ£o agora nÃºmeros que representam os valores enum internos dos tipos. text.nl: Activiteitstypes en kanaaltypes zijn nu in de zaak. PLAYING is nu Playing, GUILDTEXT is nu GuildText. In rauwe staten zijn alle veldwaarden nu cijfers die de interne waarden van de types vertegenwoordigen. Controleer alsjeblieft en update je gebruik van de types na het upgraden naar versie 2.0 of nieuwer.
text.fr: Les types d'activitÃ© et les types de canal sont maintenant dans le cas de titre. Exemple: PLAYING est maintenant Playing, GUILD_TEXT est maintenant GuildText. Dans les Ã©tats bruts, toutes les valeurs de champ de type sont maintenant des nombres reprÃ©sentant les valeurs internes des types. Assurez-vous de vÃ©rifier et de mettre Ã  jour vos utilisations des types aprÃ¨s la mise Ã  niveau de la version 2.0.0 ou plus rÃ©cente.
text.it: I tipi di attivitÃ  e i tipi di canale sono ora in caso di titolo. Esempio: PLAYING ora sta Playing, GUILD_TEXT Ã¨ ora GuildText. In stati grezzi tutti i valori di campo di tipo sono ora numeri che rappresentano i valori enum interni dei tipi. Assicuratevi di controllare e aggiornare i vostri usi dei tipi dopo l'aggiornamento alla versione 2.0.0 o piÃ¹ recente.
